document.full_text: arizona congresswoman gabrielle giffords on wednesday underwent a cranioplasty in houston, a critical step in her recovery from a gunshot wound to the head, according to hospital officials.
document.title: giffords recovering from cranioplasty in houston
lines_and_colors: arizona congresswoman gabrielle giffords on wednesday underwent a cranioplasty in houston, a critical step in her recovery from a gunshot wound to the head, according to hospital officials.
